mapper.select:
select count(*) from wanote where
m_id=#{m_id} and
w_num>0

select wanote.w_num, w_title, w_question, w_answer, w_reason, w_subject, m_id,TO_CHAR(w_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as w_date,tg_num,tg_name from wanote LEFT OUTER JOIN (select w_num,watag.tg_num,tg_name from tag,watag where watag.tg_num=tag.tg_num) watag on wanote.w_num = watag.w_num where wanote.w_num=#{w_num}
